scripts.build: yarn build:createRenderer && yarn build:deployClient && yarn build:startDevRenderer
scripts.build:createRenderer: rimraf createRenderer && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_ENV=production babel src/createRenderer --out-dir createRenderer && yarn prettier createRenderer/*
scripts.build:deployClient: rimraf deployClient && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_ENV=production babel src/deployClient --out-dir deployClient && yarn prettier deployClient/*
scripts.build:startDevRenderer: rimraf startDevRenderer && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_ENV=production babel src/startDevRenderer --out-dir startDevRenderer && yarn prettier startDevRenderer/*
scripts.watch:startDevRenderer: rimraf startDevRenderer && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_ENV=production babel src/startDevRenderer --out-dir startDevRenderer -w
